org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.flexible

Class QuorumMaj

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.zookeeper.server.quorum.flexible.QuorumMaj
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuorumVerifier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QuorumOracleMaj

    public class QuorumMaj
extends Object
implements QuorumVerifier
    This class implements a validator for majority quorums. The implementation is straightforward.
